title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Detecting Corporate Fraud
description: Roddy Boyd, an investigative reporter and founder of the Southern Investigative Reporting Foundation, discusses detecting corporate fraud at the IRE conference in Philadelphia, PA, June 6, 2015.
